# 16-Bit Signed Integer Vectors

**API Collection**

Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 16-bit integer elements.

## Vector Data Types

- **simd_short1**: A vector of one 16-bit signed integer element.
- **simd_short2**: A vector of two 16-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_short3**: A vector of three 16-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_short4**: A vector of four 16-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_short8**: A vector of eight 16-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_short16**: A vector of sixteen 16-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_short32**: A vector of thirty-two 16-bit signed integer elements.

## Packed Vector Data Types

- **simd_packed_short2**: A packed vector of two 16-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_packed_short4**: A packed vector of four 16-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_packed_short8**: A packed vector of eight 16-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_packed_short16**: A packed vector of sixteen 16-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_packed_short32**: A packed vector of thirty-two 16-bit signed integer elements.

## Signed Integer Vectors

- **8-Bit Signed Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 8-bit integer elements.
- **32-Bit Signed Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 32-bit integer elements.
- **64-Bit Signed Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 64-bit integer elements.
